title: One Hundred Horses
description: Grey Fox grew up listening to tales about a love so passionate and rare that it has become worth more than all the horses upon the face of the Earth. He doesnâ€™t believe any of it until the day he finds the rancher woman injured and near death after an attack by Brother Lion. Grey Fox now knows that it will be impossible to fulfill the dreams of a love so magnificent that he would give up everything to win the heart of a woman who is not of his people.Sarah will do anything to escape. She cannot not possibly be the girl the Comanche predicted would come into their world and be the woman of this great love. But as time and suffering pass like petals on the wind, Sarah will come to realize that the only ties that bind her are the ones around her heart.
author: Elle Marlow
